ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: Just meant that it s easy to raise funds.  I often come back from an bank run (outing or three) and find myself 500-700 richer.  In a week that adds up.. Slyde
ygData.messageBody:
Just meant that it's easy to raise funds. I often come back from an bank
run (outing or three) and find myself 500-700 richer. In a week that adds
up..

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 12:59 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation

124 is fine. you will slowly build that up with items that have +CHA and
are also worth using anyway (crown of king tranix, symphonic saber, SSS).

and what does level 52 have to do with money? =P i am level 58, and 1 week
ago i had exactly 170pp to my name, on ALL characters. funny story, i went
with myself and a 60 warrior (as a guide) to go complete my cobalt scar key.
you need the note and 200pp. i had 170pp, he had 11pp on him. we killed 10
green giants in Kael on the way there to get the other 19pp LOL. that is
how broke i was. i'm back up now, i seem to go in spurts... 20k, 0k, 20k,
0k, 30k, 0k, 15k... etc.

Shada

> Heheh - I'm 52 - even after paying 5k for SS arms I have
> about 4k in the
> bank...
>
> What about Charisma? Maybe I'm not itemed properly - but
> without that one
> ring I'm at like 124 now. Thought the CHA rings were important?
>
> Slyde

with the subject submissions.
